question: What is the main purpose of HTML?

choices.answer: Provide the structural framework for web content
Enhance the visual appearance of web pages
Execute scripts on web pages
Manage databases for web applications
The functionality of web pages
The visual appearance of HTML elements
The database structure of web applications
The server-side logic of web pages

question: Which tag in HTML represents a paragraph?

choices.answer: <div>

question: Which of the following best describes the role of CSS?

choices.answer: Styling HTML elements to enhance visual appearance
Providing structural framework for web content
Executing scripts on web pages
Managing databases for web applications

question: Which of the following analogies best represents the relationship between HTML and CSS?

choices.answer: HTML is the foundation (structure), CSS is the paint (visual styling)
HTML is the paint (visual styling), CSS is the foundation (structure)
HTML is the architect, CSS is the builder
HTML is the builder, CSS is the architect
